node.title: Shared e-scooters locked out of Brisbane party districts after midnight in six-month trial
node.alt: Purple e-scooters with helmets stand in a row at South Bank in Brisbane
node.description: Shared e-scooters will be locked from midnight to 5am on weekends in Brisbane's CBD and Fortitude Valley in a six-month safety trial from December 1.
node.content:
["Shared e-scooters will be locked from midnight to 5am on weekends in Brisbane's CBD and Fortitude Valley in a six-month safety trial from December 1, Brisbane City Council has announced.", "The council will also lower the speed limit of Beam and Neuron shared e-scooters to 15kph between midnight and 5am across the city.", "The shutdown means e-scooter users won't be able to start new trips in the safe night precinct areas of the CBD and Fortitude Valley on Friday and Saturday nights\u00a0but will be able to end a trip in those zones.", "The safe night precincts are state government programs aimed at reducing late night drug and alcohol-related violence in key entertainment suburbs.", "The council's transport committee chairman Ryan Murphy said the six-month trial would target areas and times where dangerous rider behaviour was most frequent.", "Shared e-scooters are already prevented from operating in Queen Street Mall and other high pedestrian areas.", "E-scooters are not permitted on roads, unless in quiet local streets with a speed limit of 50kph or under, and largely cannot use bike lanes.", "However, they are permitted to operate on the council's current 12-month trial of separated bike lanes in the Brisbane CBD.", "
Crash concerns
", "The trial comes after several serious e-scooter crashes in Brisbane, including one where a man in his 20s was taken to hospital in a critical condition after a collision with his e-scooter and a car last week.", "", "
The Brisbane CBD Safe Night Precinct was established to reduce late-night drug and alcohol-related violence.(ABC News: Lewi Hirvela)
", "A Jamieson Trauma Institute study of e-scooter crashes between November 2018 and May 2020 found spikes in emergency department presentations were seen between noon and midnight, and on and around weekends.", "People aged under 35 accounted for nearly 70 per cent of e-scooter injuries reported at the Royal Brisbane and Women's Hospital, Princess Alexandra Hospital, and Mater Hospital in that period.", "\"Hire e-scooters are enormously popular with both residents and visitors with the number of trips now topping five million,\" Cr Murphy said.", "Cr Murphy said he wanted the state government to apply the same rules to privately owned e-scooters.", "
E-scooter safety roundtable
", "Transport Minister Mark Bailey last week announced a roundtable discussion with dozens of stakeholders to consider how Queensland's e-scooter legislation should be amended to improve safety and support e-scooter use.", "", "
The Fortitude Valley safe night precinct boundaries cover the majority of the suburb.(ABC News: Lewi Hirvela)
", "Mr Bailey told ABC Radio Brisbane he wanted to develop a \"balanced package\" of legislation that would support users to scoot safely, and consider allowing e-scooters into on-road bike lanes.", "He said private e-scooter regulation would come under scrutiny.", "\"I'm a runner and a cyclist and I've occasionally seen [an e-scooter] zoom by me at freakish speeds and that to me is as unacceptable as someone speeding in a car or on a motorised vehicle,\" Mr Bailey\u00a0said.", "Cr Murphy said shared e-scooters would also be expanded into Brisbane's bayside suburbs, with 200 shared e-scooters to be placed in the Wynnum Manly area\u00a0and 150 in Sandgate and Shorncliffe.", "The bayside suburb trial will also run from December 1 for six months."]
